title: innumum ennai aLa
sahitya:
innamum enai ALat tiruvuLLam illaiyO

enmanakkuRai undan sevi pugavillaiyO

(innamum)  

anupallavi  

viNNavarum vizhaiyum puNNiya pAdanE

eNNamellAm niRainda ezhil vaNNanE kaNNanE

(innamum)  

caraNam  

pAril undan nigar nI enRuNarndEnE

pErinba nilai tanda innisaiyin payanE

cArukEsi rAgamAy kArmugilena

Aramuda gAna mAri pozhindavanE

(innamum)
